posts.post_content:
Posted By: David
[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/halpen/top40/websize/sc01055d25.jpg[/IMG]


I am looking for $2,100. I feel that this card belongs in a ex-mt holder. Accordingly, I am pricing it between a PSA 5 and PSA 6. The back is Piedmont. The only flaws are the top left corner and the back is off center. If I do not sell it here, I am going to cross the card with SGC. 


[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/halpen/top40/websize/cobb.jpg[/IMG]


I am looking for $1,350 on this card. The back is centered.
